overview: Rafi arrives in the city in search of Pervaneh who was taken by the Sultan. He is joined by Hassan the confectioner. Rafi is captured by the Sultan, but Hassan leads a surprise attack on the palace and the lovers are united.
tagline: A drama of flashing action and gusty humor-Sweeping lavishness-Golden magic-Romantic mystery, unfolding to a colossal climax.
title: The Lady of the Harem
